inspect(bytes,bytes).details: Optionally done as a revert, OR use the boolean provided to handle the failure.

params._message: The message payload to be inspected.
params._options: Additional options or parameters for inspection.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the inspection passed (true) or failed (false).

inspect(bytes,bytes).notice: Allows the inspector to examine LayerZero message contents and optionally throw a revert if invalid.
